hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bull Transition on Regulatory Clarity Breakouts
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL regimes with pending regulatory catalysts (like current MiCA/FCA developments), BULL transitions will occur within 2 days if: (1) BTC breaks above 20-day Bollinger Band upper bound on >30% above-average volume, (2) Crypto Fear & Greed Index jumps 15+ points in 24h, and (3) Top 10 altcoins outperform BTC by 3%+.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Regulatory clarity removes uncertainty discount. Breakout above Bollinger Band suggests momentum shift. Fear & Greed surge shows sentiment reversal. Altcoin outperformance indicates risk-on rotation beyond BTC safety trade.
entry_conditions: Regime = NEUTRAL with major regulatory news pending/announced
BTC price > 20D Bollinger Upper Band (2 std dev)
Fear & Greed Index increases ≥15 points in 24h
Equal-weight top 10 altcoin index outperforms BTC by ≥3%

exit_conditions.take_profit: Regime shifts to BULL (confidence >65%) OR 12% price appreciation
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price falls back inside Bollinger Bands with volume decline >40%

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Regulatory breakouts fail to sustain >50% of time OR lead to bull traps >40% of instances
